title: Lazer & Wout van Aert Team Up for First-Ever Red Bull-Branded Helmet For the Masses
content:
Helmet company Lazer and extreme-sports-affiliated energy drink maker Red Bull announced today the release of two Red Bull-branded helmets. The occasion marks the first timeâ€¦
